original_text: Yet the men were very good to us, and we suffered no harm, and we did not miss anything when we were in the fields, as long as we went with them.
korean_text: 우리가 들에 있어 그들과 상종할 동안에 그 사람들이 우리를 매우 선대하였으므로 우리가 다치거나 잃은 것이 없었으니

sentences.original_text: Yet the men were very good to us
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 사람들은 우리에게 매우 친절했습니다
그리고 우리는 아무 해를 입지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: and we did not miss anything
when we were in the fields
as long as we went with them
